item.title: Girona, Spain
item.description: Three days riding out of the old town on both road and gravel. Includes a run out to the coast, the famous climbs of Els Angels and Roccacorba and the best local gravel.

item.title: The Bunker Research Project
item.description: This is what an ordinary post looks like, and you’re reading a custom excerpt right now. Have fun looking around the theme, and don’t forget to check it out on your phone!
